Users first download unpack desired models temporary location, point RRASSLER directory place want store catalog. : 1) Scrape entire directory structure HEC-RAS model projects 2) geometric realization model (variation .g##), grab relevant HEC-RAS related files defined : - .g## # Geometry definitions - .prj # Projection (can non-standard proj4 string defined file) - .p## # Project file, used drive model - .f## # Steady Flow file. Profile information, flow data boundary conditions - .h## # Hydraulic Design data file - .v## # Velocity file - .o## # Output file - .r## # run file steady flow - .u## # Steady Flow file. Profile information, flow data boundary conditions - .x## # run file unsteady flow - .dss # ras unsteady flow output - .rasmap # output plan 3) Attempt place model space. done attempting parse g** g**.hdf files, guess projections, pulling collating data xid-xyz table. 4) Using extracted geometry, attempt create model footprint (hull). can constructed, model assumed correctly placed space. relevant model files copied uniquely parsed “final_model_name_key” folder /models/ folder 5) creation model hull errors , model placed _/models/unprocessed folder investigation, correction, rewrassling 6) iterations files done, RRASSLER (re)generate unified source model footprints, cross sections, points (now spatial form) HEC-RAS model, pointers back copied source data remains unaltered.
